SEARCH
Package albumcollection

Class Collection

java.lang.Object
albumcollection.Collection
public class Collection extends Object
This class defines the ADT Collection; an instance of Collection can hold a list of Album objects
Author:
Ved Patel, Vivek Manthri

  • Method Details

    • getSize

      public int getSize()
      A getter method returns the size of the albums list
      Returns:
      the number of albums in the list

    • getAlbums

      public Album[] getAlbums()
      A getter method returns the list of albums
      Returns:
      an array consisting of the list of albums

    • find

      private int find(Album album)
      Helper method to find the index of a given album in the list of albums
      Parameters:
      album - the album to find in the list
      Returns:
      the integer index of the album; -1 if not found in the list

    • grow

      private void grow()
      Helper method to increase the capacity of the albums list by 4

    • contains

      public boolean contains(Album album)
      Checks if the list of albums contains a given album
      Parameters:
      album - the album to check
      Returns:
      true if album is in the list; false otherwise

    • add

      public boolean add(Album album)
      Adds a new album to the list of albums
      Parameters:
      album - the album to add
      Returns:
      true if the album is new and is added; false if it already exists

    • remove

      public boolean remove(Album album)
      Removes an album from the list of albums. Maintains the relative order of the events in the array after the deletion
      Parameters:
      album - the album to remove
      Returns:
      true if the album is found and removed; false if it doesn't exist

    • getReleasedForRating

      public Date getReleasedForRating(Album album)
      Retrieves the release date of an album in the list
      Parameters:
      album - the album whose release date is to be retrieved
      Returns:
      the release date of the given album

    • rate

      public void rate(Album album, int rating)
      Rates an album in the list
      Parameters:
      album - the album to rate
      rating - the rating to assign

    • printByDate

      public void printByDate()
      Displays all the albums in the collection sorted by release dates, and then titles. Uses insertion sort logic to order the albums

    • printByGenre

      public void printByGenre()
      Displays all the albums in the collection sorted by genres, then artist's names, and then artist's date of births. Uses insertion sort logic to order the albums

    • printByRating

      public void printByRating()
      Displays all the albums in the collection sorted by average ratings, and then titles. Uses insertion sort logic to order the albums
